statements: SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE region = 'East';
SELECT product_name, sales_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sales_amount > 1000;
SELECT region, COUNT(*) FROM sales_data GROUP BY region;
SELECT product_name, sales_amount FROM sales_data ORDER BY sales_amount DESC;
SELECT product_id, AVG(sales_amount) FROM sales_data GROUP BY product_id HAVING AVG(sales_amount) > 500;
SELECT * FROM sales_data ORDER BY sales_amount DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT product_name, sales_amount FROM sales_data WHERE region = 'West'
SELECT product_id, product_name, region, sales_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sales_amount > 1000
SELECT product_name, sales_amount FROM sales_data WHERE region='East' AND sales_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000
SELECT * FROM sales_data ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE region = 'North America';
SELECT product_name, sales_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sales_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sales_amount DESC;
SELECT product_name, sales_amount FROM sales_data WHERE region = 'Europe' AND sales_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, SUM(sales_amount) AS total_sales FROM sales_data GROUP BY product_name HAVING SUM(sales_amount) > 2000 ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
SELECT product_name, region, sales_amount FROM sales_data WHERE product_name LIKE 'Apple%' ORDER BY region, sales_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE region = 'East' ORDER BY sales_amount DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_name, sales_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sales_amount > 1000 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, region, sales_amount FROM sales_data WHERE region = 'West' AND sales_amount > 5000 ORDER BY region ASC, sales_amount DESC;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT product_id), region FROM sales_data GROUP BY region HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT product_id) > 5 ORDER BY region ASC;

SELECT s.product_name, s.sales_amount, t.total_sales FROM sales_data s JOIN top_selling_products t ON s.product_id = t.product_id WHERE s.region = t.region ORDER BY t.total_sales DESC, s.product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE region = 'East';
SELECT product_name, sales_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sales_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sales_amount DESC;
SELECT region_name, country FROM regions WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT id, product_name, sales_amount FROM sales_data WHERE region = 'West' AND sales_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT product_name, sales_amount FROM sales_data WHERE region = 'North America';
SELECT * FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT region_name, country FROM regions WHERE country = 'USA' AND region_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Clothing' AND price > 50;
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE sales_amount BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000 ORDER BY region, product_name;
SELECT * FROM Products;
SELECT product_name, category FROM Products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT product_id, product_name, category, price FROM Products ORDER BY product_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT DISTINCT category FROM Products;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM Products WHERE category='Electronics';
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM Products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM Products WHERE category = 'Clothing' ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT region_name, country FROM Regions WHERE country = 'USA' ORDER BY region_name;
SELECT sale_id, product_id, region_id, sale_date, quantity FROM Sales WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, region_id, total_sales FROM TopSellingProducts WHERE total_sales > 500 ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
SELECT * FROM region;
SELECT product_name, category FROM product;
SELECT sales_id, quantity, sale_date FROM sales;
SELECT region_id, region_name FROM region ORDER BY region_id DESC;
SELECT product_name, category FROM product WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY product_name;
SELECT * FROM region;
SELECT product_name, category FROM product WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT s.product_id, p.product_name, r.region_name, s.quantity, s.sale_date FROM sales s JOIN product p ON s.product_id = p.product_id JOIN region r ON s.region_id = r.region_id;
SELECT p.product_name, tp.total_sales FROM product p JOIN top_products tp ON p.product_id = tp.product_id ORDER BY tp.total_sales DESC;
SELECT r.region_name, p.product_name FROM region r JOIN regions_with_top_products rp ON r.region_id = rp.region_id JOIN product p ON rp.product_id = p.product_id;
